name: Trim Rush
description:
Heya! This is my third game made alone for a Game Jam.

The theme was "Fortress", and the limitation was that the player must control multiple entities. Therefore I decided to make this quick paced game about two gardeners! They must help their kingdom and protect its fortress from... ivy.

It is a simple game, so I don't plan on making much more out of this. However, I would appreciate your feedback!

Thank you for checking out my game!
